maml:description.maml:para: Create an Azure website
Create an Azure website and prepare for website deployment via Git

An alternative hostname for the new azure website.
The username you have specified in the Windows Azure Portal for Git deployment

Set up a local git repository and link it to the website. If specified, this will set up a git repository in the local directory and add a remote named 'azure' that links to the website in Windows Azure.
The name of the website
